## Government Tender: Grounds Maintenance for Connaught Rifle Range
### Description

Government of Canada, as represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites interested bidders to provide Landscaping Services, Snow Removal Services, and Exterior Grounds Maintenance at the Connaught Rifle Range located in Ottawa.

### Tender Details
* Tender Reference Number: WS4472275199
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: WS4472275199
* Tender Closing Date: July 10, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* Amendment Date: June 27, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expired
* Tender Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive Bidding

### Notice Description

The successful bidder shall provide the following services:
- Snow removal
- Landscaping and maintenance of exterior grounds
- Labour, material, equipment, supervision, and transportation for the services

A mandatory site visit will be held on June 11, 2024, at 10:00 AM EDT, at the Connaught Rifle Range, 31 Shirley's Bay Blvd, Ottawa. Only two representatives per bidder will be permitted to attend. Bidders must confirm their attendance by June 4th, 2024.

### Contact Information
Contact Person: Caroline Richard
Email: caroline.richard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19708892?extsite=MTk3MDg4OTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Procurement Category

This procurement is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, among others.

### Provenance

This tender is part of the Procurement Transformation Initiative and is designed to promote transparency and efficiency in the government procurement process.
